common.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.model.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICopy, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<AbstractSquare>

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<AbstractSquare>, ICopy, java.io.Serializable
    Board that contains all abstract squares for the game and is copyable.
    Author:
    njpanzarino, jasirocki - jdoc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
